tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE purchases (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    product_id INT,
    purchase_date DATE,
    amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
);
CREATE TABLE customers (customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(100), email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, phone_number VARCHAR(15), address TEXT)
CREATE TABLE purchases (purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_id INT, purchase_amount DECIMAL(10, 2), purchase_date DATE)
CREATE TABLE preferences (preference_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_id INT, preference_category VARCHAR(50), preference_value VARCHAR(50)
CREATE TABLE offers (offer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, offer_name VARCHAR(100), description TEXT, discount DECIMAL(5, 2), validity_period DATE)

CREATE TABLE customers (customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15));

CREATE TABLE purchases (purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  purchase_date DATE,
  total_amount DECIMAL);

CREATE TABLE products (product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  category VARCHAR(50),
  price DECIMAL);
